resources.string: ZT Shopping Store is an online Shopping App. ZT deals with all types of products like electronics,clothes,Grocery,Accessories, baby products and lot more. To become an iconic trendsetting and ever-evolving high-street fashion brand for the young generation by contemporizing tradition with the latest trends and turning it into an urban lifestyle; ZT aims to highlight the prevalent issues in society and cater to them using the social element of the brand.
